Hero.title: One-Stop Global Payment Solution
Hero.subtitle: TaroPay has crossed the globe to make payments effortless
Hero.description: We are committed to building the most stable payment system in the world and leading the future with international payments.

GlobalCoverage.title: Global Coverage Across Multiple Regions
GlobalCoverage.description: TaroPay supports payments in over 200 countries and regions worldwide, providing seamless cross-border payment solutions.

Features.title: Products & Services
Features.subtitle: Comprehensive payment solutions designed for global businesses

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: TaroPay provides a stable payment gateway that merchants can integrate into their products through API interface calls. Simple, fast and easy access.

rapidity.title: Rapidity
rapidity.description: TaroPay supports D0 real-time settlement in all regions, and the transaction funds arrive in real time, whether it is a receipt or a payment, it can reach the corresponding payee's account within seconds.

security.title: Security
security.description: TaroPay payment system uses state-of-the-art security technology to protect merchants' funds. Bank-grade encryption and multi-factor authentication are used to ensure the security of the payment process.

cost.title: Cost Effectiveness
cost.description: TaroPay payment system has lower transaction costs. You can reduce transaction fees, improve efficiency and reduce operating costs by using our payment system.

global.title: Global and Industry-Wide
global.description: The TaroPay payment system supports the local payment needs of the entire industry in different countries and regions. Household can make and receive payments globally, without being restricted by geography or industry.

response.title: Quick Response
response.description: TaroPay payment system values the responsiveness of customer service and strives to respond in the shortest possible time after users raise questions or ask for support. We support 7*24 customer service to improve customer satisfaction.

Products.title: Products & Services
Products.subtitle: Comprehensive payment solutions to grow your business globally

statistics.title: Smart Business Analytics
statistics.description: Through clear transaction statistics and intuitive business trends, you can better grasp marketing direction, easily control daily operations, and naturally lead business success.

global.title: Global Payment Solutions
global.description: Based on a one-stop payment processing platform, we will help you enter new markets, quickly introduce multiple payment methods, and open broader payment channels. Partner with us for unlimited possibilities and unstoppable business growth!

gateway.title: Easy Payment Gateway Integration
gateway.description: We are committed to making payment experience fast, easy and seamless. Explore our payment gateway to learn how to quickly integrate and make your payment process simple and efficient, boosting user satisfaction!

riskcontrol.title: Flexible Dynamic Risk Control
riskcontrol.description: We provide flexible and reliable risk control modules, customizing comprehensive and effective risk control solutions according to merchants' business scenarios. Real-time monitoring and analysis of all transactions to identify abnormal payment orders and effectively protect merchants' funds and transaction security.

accounting.title: Simplified Accounting
accounting.description: TaroPay integrates your merchant account to the cloud, making reconciliation effortless. With simple steps, you can quickly open your dedicated account and enjoy convenient and efficient payment management experience!

multilang.title: Multi-language API Integration
multilang.description: Support API interfaces in multiple programming languages, allowing technical teams to quickly integrate our payment services. No matter what technology stack you use, you can easily integrate.

Solutions.title: One-Stop Global Payment Solution
Solutions.subtitle: Everything you need to accept payments and grow your business globally

account.title: Free Opening of Payment Account
account.description: Open a local currency account online, without complicated approval process, and it only takes 1 minute.

statistics.title: Integration of Transaction Statistics
statistics.description: Automatically record and integrate transaction records and payment trend analysis to help merchants better grasp business data.

currency.title: Multi-Currency Support
currency.description: Support multiple currencies and payment methods to meet the needs of merchants in different regions and industries.

cta.title: Ready to transform your payment system?
cta.description: Join thousands of businesses that trust TaroPay for their global payment needs.

Footer.description: Building the most stable payment system in the world and leading the future with international payments.

Home.title: Welcome
Home.intro: This is a demo with {count} message.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: TaroPay is a platform dedicated to global payment solutions. We have established partnerships with numerous banks and payment companies worldwide, committed to providing secure, fast, and stable one-stop transaction payment and settlement solutions for merchants in all industries globally.
hero.content: No matter where you are, our platform will provide you with reliable payment processing and settlement services. We work closely with multiple international payment institutions to ensure the security of your funds and provide various payment methods to meet the needs of different regions and users. With our payment service platform, you can easily handle global transactions and achieve the convenience of local and cross-border payments. Our goal is to make payments simpler and provide strong support for your business development.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Providing payment solutions for merchants in all industries globally

convenient.title: Convenient and Efficient Integration
convenient.description: Provide API payment gateway to maximize reduction of merchant development and quick integration.

settlement.title: D0 Real-time Settlement
settlement.description: Provide multiple payment and settlement service channels with real-time fund settlement.

security.title: Intelligent Dynamic Risk Control
security.description: World-class encryption algorithms and security technology architecture, with intelligent dynamic risk control based on business scenarios.

service.title: Quality and Timely Service
service.description: 7×24 hours online human service to promptly answer any questions you have about using the payment system.

global.title: Globalization
global.description: Committed to building the world's most stable payment system, leading the future with international payments. Our motto is to be the global leader in top-tier secure and stable payment channels.

local.title: Localization
local.description: TaroPay caters to local payment habits and localized environments in every region we operate. We maintain the lowest rates while ensuring the industry's highest payment success rates. Making customer payment experience better is our long-term goal.

future.title: Next Steps
future.description: To provide better payment solution experiences for merchants in more regions, we plan to expand to countries with large populations and high GDP, such as Nigeria, South Africa, Bangladesh, Pakistan, and others.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you urgently need a stable, secure, and convenient payment solution, please fill out our partner contact form.

form.name: Name
form.message: Please leave a message so we can better serve you
form.privacy: I confirm that I have read TaroPay's Privacy Policy and agree to the use of my data in accordance with that policy.
